content: make a crochet scarf that looks both classic and modern the snowdrift scarf is a quick chunky hat pattern full of texture keep warm with this beautiful cozy scarf or make them as gifts the pdf includes *photo tutorials for stitches and techniques materials needed to make pattern size l11 8 0mm crochet hook 300 yards 3 skeins of lion brand s wool ease thick & quick yarn in cranberry or similar weight 6 yarn scissors yarn needle measuring tape flat object for making optional fringe finished size 76 long x 6 wide returns will not be available for this pattern as it is a pdf download but i am happy to answer any questions you may have please email me at ashley@tinycouchcrochet com if you enjoy making this pattern please tag me in your social media posts @tinycouchcrochet on ig and tiktok i d love to see and share your finished items this pattern and the images above/contained within the pattern are for personal use only and may not be resold finished items made using this pattern may be sold - however please credit and tag the designer tiny couch crochet when doing so
